name: Paper Route
description:
Patch 2 (1.4) - Fixed the scene transition bug I believe

Patch 1 - Fixed the level key that did not work in browser - just use the number key now

Made for the Ludum Dare #49 Gamejam in 72 hours. The theme is UNSTABLE.

You need to make some pocket money, and Old Man McLudum has the opportunity for you! Unfortunately, your trailer is pretty unreliable, but it's the best you've got to cart newspapers across the backroads, suburbs, and even through a construction site. Watch the newspapers fly at any minor bump, with fully simulated 2D Rigidbody physics!

Tips

If you happen to crash, or just want to check out the levels without beating each one, you can press the 1, 2 and 3 keys to trigger each one!

Credits

All programming, design, sound and design by me, with a lovely helping hand from my girlfriend on the backgrounds, foreground assets and playtesting.
